column4: hey....im trying to install linux from the cd...it boots fine....I get as far as copying the files to my hd (ext3 partition) then it says press ok, i press ok...the cd ejects, but then its frozen...it doesnt reboot when i press enter....I restart and grub shows up..I can boot into windows...but when i try to boot into freespire..black screen...whats up here?
but theres nnoone in the freespir channel
this is the ubuntu support channel not the freespire support channel
